eu.name: European Union
eu.description: Cutting-edge innovations from across the European Union

models.title: Mistral 7B
models.description: Mistral AI's breakthrough 7-billion parameter language model delivers exceptional performance while maintaining efficiency. This French innovation outperforms larger models on many benchmarks, representing a new paradigm in cost-effective AI deployment.

models.title: FLUX.1
models.description: Black Forest Labs' revolutionary text-to-image model sets new standards for photorealistic generation. Built by former Stability AI researchers in Germany, FLUX.1 delivers unprecedented quality and prompt adherence.

models.title: Phi-3 Mini
models.description: Microsoft Research Europe's compact 3.8B parameter model proves that smaller can be smarter. Optimized for mobile deployment, it delivers GPT-3.5 level performance in a fraction of the size.

models.title: ESMFold
models.description: Meta AI's protein structure prediction model revolutionizes biological research. Trained on evolutionary data, ESMFold enables rapid protein folding predictions for drug discovery and synthetic biology applications.

models.title: mT5
models.description: Google Research's multilingual T5 model supports 101 languages with exceptional cross-lingual transfer capabilities. Developed in European research centers, mT5 democratizes NLP for global applications.

uk.name: United Kingdom
uk.description: Pioneering innovations from British research institutions

models.title: AlphaFold 3
models.description: DeepMind's Nobel Prize-winning breakthrough in protein structure prediction. AlphaFold 3 has revolutionized biology by solving the 50-year-old protein folding problem, enabling unprecedented advances in drug discovery.

models.title: GraphCast
models.description: Revolutionary weather prediction AI that outperforms traditional numerical models. GraphCast provides 10-day forecasts with unprecedented accuracy, transforming meteorology and climate science.

models.title: MuZero
models.description: Advanced reinforcement learning algorithm that masters games without knowing the rules. MuZero combines tree search with learned models, achieving superhuman performance across diverse domains.

models.title: AlphaMissense
models.description: Predicts the pathogenicity of genetic variants with remarkable accuracy. AlphaMissense helps clinicians interpret genetic mutations and advance personalized medicine approaches.

models.title: Whisper
models.description: Robust speech recognition system trained on diverse audio data. Whisper approaches human-level accuracy across languages and demonstrates remarkable robustness to accents and background noise.

swiss.name: Switzerland
swiss.description: Precision engineering from Swiss research excellence

models.title: FedML
models.description: ETH Zurich's federated machine learning framework enables privacy-preserving AI training across distributed devices. FedML allows collaborative learning without sharing sensitive data.

models.title: PyTorch Lightning
models.description: High-performance PyTorch wrapper developed at EPFL for scalable deep learning. Lightning simplifies distributed training while maintaining research flexibility and reproducibility.

models.title: ChemBERTa
models.description: Swiss pharmaceutical giant Roche's molecular property prediction model. ChemBERTa accelerates drug discovery by predicting chemical properties and toxicity from molecular structures.

models.title: FinBERT
models.description: Financial sentiment analysis model developed by Swiss banking institutions. FinBERT specializes in understanding financial language for risk assessment and market analysis.

models.title: SwissGPT
models.description: IDIAP Research Institute's multilingual model optimized for Swiss German, French, Italian, and Romansh. SwissGPT preserves linguistic diversity while delivering state-of-the-art performance.
